thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 09 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Deutsche Beteiligungs AG says Q2 net income much lower than year earlier

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Deutsche Beteiligungs AG says Q2 net income much lower than year earlier
text:
April 9 (Reuters) - Deutsche Beteiligungs AG:
* ADHOC: DEUTSCHE BETEILIGUNGS AG: GROSS RESULT OF VALUATION AND DISPOSAL OF THE PORTFOLIO IN THE SECOND QUARTER OF THE 2017/2018 FINANCIAL YEAR
* SAYS GROSS RESULT OF VALUATION AND DISPOSAL OF PORTFOLIO IN Q2 OF 2017/2018 FINANCIAL YEAR
* SAYS NET INCOME FOR Q2 OF 2017/2018 IS EXPECTED TO BE SUBSTANTIALLY LOWER THAN FIGURE FROM SAME QUARTER OF 2016/2017 FINANCIAL YEAR
* SAYS GROSS RESULT OF VALUATION AND DISPOSAL FOR Q2 IS EXPECTED TO BE IN SINGLE-DIGIT MILLION EURO RANGE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
